texts.biography: Synca was originally an aboveworlder, and though she loyally serves the Dungeon Overlords she really prefers the great outdoors to the dank, cramped spaces of the caverns of Nighon.
texts.name: Synca

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Manticores or Scorpicores for each level attained after 6th level.
specialty.name: Manticores
